name: Turtle Trouble
description:
Protect a Toy Turtle from the dangers of the factory he was built in as he tries to escape.

Controls:

Left Click: Click to interact with objects and to swap lanes!

Escape: Pause (Of Course).

NameRoleKoltonix
ProgrammerNachoNinja
Designer & Artist

Font Used: https://www.dafont.com/8bit-wonder.font

How does it relate to Rewind?
Our idea here is that you are able to rewind and change events like the spilled vats, or the pistons and doors. Furthermore, we also thought it would be a neat idea to make the Turtle a robot that has the wind up design.

Post Mortem:

If we had more time and energy we would have ideally liked to have taken this idea further by creating more levels with more features such as ropes that you can pull to lift objects, or a crank to turn a conveyor. Including these would have given the game more depth and would allow for more varied level design.

Maybe one day we'll come back to it to polish and refine it!
